thread.section_title: Egerton House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Doggy galore
thread.title_full: Doggy galore - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: paulfuykschot
title: Doggy galore
text: Booked in for Mothers Day Afternoon, and added one little doggy afternoon tea. From the moment we arrived, we were treated like Kings and Queens. The lounge was filled with people, dogs and afternoon teas. The service was impeccable, the food was delicious (those egg and mayo sandwiches, wow!). The little dog was looked after so well, and fell asleep soon after eating her biscuits! Thank you so much for looking after us all, we will be back!
